title: NERO7 ESSENTIALS
description:
Hey all, this is my first attempt at a torrent, I hope that it works for you as it did when I burned it and installed it on another computer.  

Just Burn the ISO to a disc, then reinsert it in the disc drive and it should auto run.  If it does not then just Browse (or explore) the disc and click on the "Autostart" file then click on Autorun. 

Click on "Install Nero 7 Essentials" and a new window will appear, click on the "Nero 7 Essentials" tab, follow the instructions and accept the terms and conditions, install and enjoy.   

It will auto matically come up with the Product Key, just put in your name and your Organization (if you want too)

Once you have installed the program you will need to do one more thing:

Click Start>all programs>Nero 7 Essentials>tools>Nero Scout, once this is open uncheck the box that says "Integrate Nero Scout in Windows Explorer" the click apply.  After that then uncheck the box in the upper lefthand corner that says "Enable Nero Scout" and click apply, the click OK.  This will keep you from having an "end task" error every time you shut down or restart your computer.  This was something that I had to research my self to get it to stop.  It is some kind of glitch they have not yet worked out.

If that does not work please let me know.
 
Programs:

Nero Express 7 Essentials
Nero ShowTime 3 Essentials
Nero Vision 4 Essentials
Nero Recode 2 Essentials
InCD 5 essentials
 
Also 

Adobe Reader 
and a User Manual

I will seed this for 1-2 days and will see how it goes.

Seed and Enjoy!!
